sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The richt vay to the kingdome of heuine is techit heir in the x co[m]mandis of God, and in the creid, and Pater noster, in the quhilk al christine me[n] sal find al thing [th]at is neidful and requirit to onderstand to the saluation of the saul Pedersen, Christiern, 1480?-1554. Gau, John, d. 1553.
[240] p.
Be me Jhone Hochstraten, [Prentit in Malmoo : the xvi day of October, Anno MDXXXiii. [1533]]
By Christiern Pedersen. Imprint from colophon. A translation, by John Gau, from the Latin original by Christiern Pedersen. Largely based on: Rhegius, Urbanus. "Die zwölff artikel unsers christliche glaubens", published in 1523.--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog. Formerly also STC 11686. Signatures: A-P. Reproduction of the original in Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
The richt vay to the kingdome of heuine is techit heir in the x co[m]mandis of God, and in the creid, and Pater noster, in the quhilk al christine me[n] sal find al thing [th]at is neidful and requirit to onderstand to the saluation of the saul Pedersen, Christiern, 1480?-1554. Gau, John, d. 1553.
[240] p.
Be me Jhone Hochstraten, [Prentit in Malmoo : the xvi day of October, Anno MDXXXiii. [1533]]
By Christiern Pedersen. Imprint from colophon. A translation, by John Gau, from the Latin original by Christiern Pedersen. Largely based on: Rhegius, Urbanus. "Die zwölff artikel unsers christliche glaubens", published in 1523.--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog. Formerly also STC 11686. Signatures: A-P.
